titleStmt.title: An Account of the secret services of Monsieur de Vernay, the French minister at Ratisbonne to Count Teckeley as they pass'd by way of letter, with the cypher and key taken from the original, printed in French at Ratisbonne : together with the speech and memorial of the imperial minister Zorowiski, deliver'd to the King of Poland : to which is added Mercurius panegyricus.
titleStmt.author: L. S.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
